idiom.meaning: So absorbed as to neglect basic needs
idiom.example: The researcher became so absorbed in the project she barely ate or slept for days

shortDescription: Han Dynasty biographers first celebrated this level of dedication where scholars abandoned sleep (废寝) and forgot food (忘食).
